import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {ProductDetailComponent} from "../product-detail/product-detail.component"; import {Product} from "../models"; import {ActivatedRoute} from "@angular/router"; import {MyDB} from "../db"; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { products: Product[]; constructor() { this.products = []; } }
